co.tinode.tinodesdk

Class Tinode.EventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.tinode.tinodesdk.Tinode.EventListener
  • Enclosing class:
    Tinode

    public static class Tinode.EventListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Callback interface called by Connection when it receives events from the websocket.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        public void onConnect(int code,
                      java.lang.String reason,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
        Connection established successfully, handshakes exchanged. The connection is ready for login.
        Parameters:
        code - should be always 201
        reason - should be always "Created"
        params - server parameters, such as protocol version

      • onDisconnect

        public void onDisconnect(boolean byServer,
                         int code,
                         java.lang.String reason)
        Connection was dropped
        Parameters:
        byServer - true if connection was closed by server
        code - numeric code of the error which caused connection to drop
        reason - error message

      • onLogin

        public void onLogin(int code,
                    java.lang.String text)
        Result of successful or unsuccessful Tinode.login(java.lang.String) attempt.
        Parameters:
        code - a numeric value between 200 and 2999 on success, 400 or higher on failure
        text - "OK" on success or error message

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(ServerMessage msg)
        Handle generic server message.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to be processed

      • onRawMessage

        public void onRawMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Handle unparsed message. Default handler calls #dispatchPacket(...) on a websocket thread. A subclassed listener may wish to call dispatchPacket() on a UI thread
        Parameters:
        msg - message to be processed

      • onCtrlMessage

        public void onCtrlMessage(MsgServerCtrl ctrl)
        Handle control message
        Parameters:
        ctrl - control message to process

      • onDataMessage

        public void onDataMessage(MsgServerData data)
        Handle data message
        Parameters:
        data - control message to process

      • onInfoMessage

        public void onInfoMessage(MsgServerInfo info)
        Handle info message
        Parameters:
        info - info message to process

      • onMetaMessage

        public void onMetaMessage(MsgServerMeta meta)
        Handle meta message
        Parameters:
        meta - meta message to process

      • onPresMessage

        public void onPresMessage(MsgServerPres pres)
        Handle presence message
        Parameters:
        pres - control message to process
